title: How to See Less of Someone on Facebook

steps.title: Open Facebook.
steps.content: Open Facebook. Navigate to https://www.facebook.com/ on a browser, or open the Facebook app on your phone or tablet.

steps.title: Search for the person you wish to unfollow.
steps.content: Search for the person you wish to unfollow. Type their name into the search bar at the top, then select their name in the results to navigate to their profile.

steps.title: Click or tap the Friends icon under the cover photo to the right.
steps.content: Click or tap the Friends icon under the cover photo to the right. It looks like a person with a checkmark.

steps.title: Select Unfollow.
steps.content: Select Unfollow . You will now stop seeing their posts on your news feed. If you are friends, you will remain friends. This icon will not appear if you are not friends with them. Instead, click the button that says Unfollow .

steps.title: Open Facebook.
steps.content: Open Facebook. Navigate to https://www.facebook.com/ on a browser, or open the Facebook app on your phone or tablet.

steps.title: Scroll through your news feed as normal.
steps.content: Scroll through your news feed as normal. Your news feed is the home page of Facebook that contains posts from your friends, groups, and pages.

steps.title: Click or tap the three dots … on a post.
steps.content: Click or tap the three dots … on a post. Chose a post made by the person you want to see less of. The dots will be at the top-right corner of the post.

steps.title: Select Snooze ... for 30 days.
steps.content: Select Snooze ... for 30 days . This will temporarily stop this person from appearing on your news feed for 30 days. If you are friends, you will remain friends. You can also choose to unfollow someone from this menu instead of snoozing them for 30 days by selecting Unfollow . This stops their posts permanently from appearing on your news feed.

steps.title: Open Facebook.
steps.content: Open Facebook. Navigate to https://www.facebook.com/ on a browser, or open the Facebook app on your phone or tablet.

steps.title: Search for the person you wish to unfriend.
steps.content: Search for the person you wish to unfriend. Type their name into the search bar at the top, then select their name in the results to navigate to their profile.

steps.title: Click or tap the Friends icon under the cover to the right.
steps.content: Click or tap the Friends icon under the cover to the right. It looks like a person with a checkmark.

steps.title: Select Unfriend.
steps.content: Select Unfriend . This will remove this person as a friend from Facebook. You will no longer see their posts, and may not be able to view their timeline, depending on their privacy settings.
